channel.title: NPR Programs: Morning Edition
channel.description: Morning Edition takes listeners around the country and the world with multi-faceted stories and commentaries every weekday. Hosts Steve Inskeep, Leila Fadel, Michel Martin and A Martínez bring you the latest breaking news and features to prepare you for the day.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Minnesota State Sen. Zaynab Mohamed reacts to fatal ICE shooting of Minneapolis woman
item.description: NPR's Steve Inskeep speaks with Minnesota State Sen. Zaynab Mohamed, who represents the Minneapolis district where a woman was fatally shot by an ICE agent Wednesday.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Steve Inskeep speaks with Minnesota State Sen. Zaynab Mohamed, who represents the Minneapolis district where a woman was fatally shot by an ICE agent Wednesday.
item.dc:creator: Steve Inskeep

item.title: Minnesota leaders denounce Trump's immigration crackdown after deadly shooting
item.description: Minnesota state and city leaders condemned the Trump administration's immigration crackdown in Minneapolis following Wednesday's fatal shooting of a 37-year-old woman by an ICE agent.
item.content:encoded: Minnesota state and city leaders condemned the Trump administration's immigration crackdown in Minneapolis following Wednesday's fatal shooting of a 37-year-old woman by an ICE agent.
item.dc:creator: Meg Anderson

item.title: Minnesota AG Keith Ellison on deadly shooting of Minneapolis woman by an ICE officer
item.description: NPR's Leila Fadel speaks with Minnesota Attorney General Keith Ellison about the deadly shooting of a Minneapolis woman by an ICE officer and the presence of 2,000 ICE agents in the city.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Leila Fadel speaks with Minnesota Attorney General Keith Ellison about the deadly shooting of a Minneapolis woman by an ICE officer and the presence of 2,000 ICE agents in the city.
item.dc:creator: Leila Fadel

item.title: Lawmakers briefed on Trump administration's 3-pronged plan for Venezuela
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio and Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth briefed lawmakers Wednesday on the Trump administration's plans for Venezuela.
item.content:encoded: Secretary of State Marco Rubio and Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth briefed lawmakers Wednesday on the Trump administration's plans for Venezuela.
item.dc:creator: Barbara Sprunt

item.title: House to vote on renewing ACA subsidies as a potential deal takes shape in the Senate
item.description: While the three-year extension for Affordable Care Act subsidies is expected to pass the House, it may not go far in the Senate. But a bipartisan group of senators say they are close on a compromise.
item.content:encoded:
While the three-year extension for Affordable Care Act subsidies is expected to pass the House, it may not go far in the Senate. But a bipartisan group of senators say they are close on a compromise.

(Image credit: Saul Loeb)
item.dc:creator: Sam Gringlas

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: Investigation continues into fatal shooting of Minneapolis woman by ICE agent, U.S. seizes Venezuela-bound oil tanker after two-week chase, Trump administration unveils new food pyramid.
item.content:encoded: Investigation continues into fatal shooting of Minneapolis woman by ICE agent, U.S. seizes Venezuela-bound oil tanker after two-week chase, Trump administration unveils new food pyramid.
item.dc:creator: Michel Martin

item.title: A preview of what's coming to the small screen in January
item.description: Two popular streaming series return Thursday: "The Pitt" and "The Traitors." Pop Culture Happy Hour previews those shows and some of the other big events coming to the small screen in January.
item.content:encoded: Two popular streaming series return Thursday: "The Pitt" and "The Traitors." Pop Culture Happy Hour previews those shows and some of the other big events coming to the small screen in January.
item.dc:creator: Aisha Harris

item.title: White House says 'all options' are on the table for Greenland, including diplomacy
item.description: The White House says "all options" are on the table when it comes to the U.S. potentially acquiring Greenland, including diplomacy. Several European leaders have fervently pushed back.
item.content:encoded: The White House says "all options" are on the table when it comes to the U.S. potentially acquiring Greenland, including diplomacy. Several European leaders have fervently pushed back.
item.dc:creator: Franco Ordoñez

item.title: Trump administration's new food pyramid puts meat, cheese and vegetables at the top
item.description: The Trump administration has unveiled a new food pyramid that puts meat and cheese at the top, alongside fruits and vegetables, and calls for fewer highly processed foods.
item.content:encoded: The Trump administration has unveiled a new food pyramid that puts meat and cheese at the top, alongside fruits and vegetables, and calls for fewer highly processed foods.
item.dc:creator: Allison Aubrey

item.title: Trump cites numbers a lot. Sometimes they're mathematically impossible
item.description: President Trump loves to use figures and percentages even when they are sometimes mathematically impossible.
item.content:encoded: President Trump loves to use figures and percentages even when they are sometimes mathematically impossible.
item.dc:creator: Tamara Keith
